import React from 'react' class Users extends React.Component{ handleUpdateUser() { fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/users' + this.state.addUser.id, { method : 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(this.state.addUser) }).then( this.getAllUsers() ) } deleteUser(e, id) { fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/users' + id, { method : 'DELETE', }).then( this.getAllUsers() ) } render(){ return(
